text: Darby Berkhout (born 20 May 1966) is a Canadian rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Port Colborne Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Canada Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Canada Category:Rowers at the 1987 Pan American Games
title: Darby Berkhout
